message: I think it's fair to split the money 90/10, with me getting the bigger share since I'm the one making the first offer. But I'm open to negotiation!

I think it's a good starting point to split the money 60/40, considering it's a fair and reasonable division. I'm open to negotiations and willing to make adjustments to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your offer, but I'm going to counter with a 70/30 split.  I think that's a fair compromise, considering I'm the one making the proposal this time.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement!

I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a 55/45 split. I think this is a more balanced proposal that takes into account our previous offers. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
